channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tesco bag with 30 bags approx of dog poo, 31st October
item.description:
Tesco bag next to the entrance of Games Court between Willow Walk and Setchell Way, full of bags of dog poo. Please clear as it is a health hazard

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Willow Walk, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside number 5, 31st October
item.description:
I reported this problem at the beginning of this week (your Ref 8345346). But was told it will be done on Scheduled Day But there is no scheduled day for Coverdale Rd; this road only gets swept when requested on Fix Mystreet, and has not been done for more than two weeks Thank you
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Coverdale Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Thames Water Closed Blackbrook Lane = Chaos !, 31st October
item.description:
Thames Water have yet again dug up Blackbrook Lane , shutting it with 'Road Closed' , cones are everyone along with a 3 way light system on Reynard Close and Wellsmoor Gardens , which makes no sense .... these cones are being moved by drivers getting out of cars , and driving through the so called 'Road Closure' down Blackbrook Lane.... its been bedlam all day , not too mention the traffic issues and congestion into Bickley Park Road , and Hawthorne Road . I suggest you get onto this company , who I might add have not even been on site for 2 days and get this sorted ASAP !
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blackbrook Lane, Bickley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree branches close to house., 31st October
item.description:

item.title: Paving stone has sunk and is on its axis pretending out of the floor level, 31st October
item.description:
This paving stone is sticking up so far that it is in an imminent position for someone to cause injury to a person of any age. It is essential that this is fixed before somebody is severely injured and t the worst case hospitalised.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 23-32, New James Court, Nunhead, London

item.title: Street light outside no. 6 Coptic Street/Victoria House coffee., 31st October
item.description:
The street light above is STILL not working. An engineer claimed that it had been resolved yesterday (Thursday 30th) but on Thursday night it was still not working. Could it be that the timer is not working to switch the light on or is set incorrectly? I am pressing with this issue because this area has a long history of anti-social behaviour and the street light not working makes it very dark on a night. Please can you get an engineer to check the timer. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Little Russell Street, Bloomsbury, London
Report on FixMyStreet
